video.title: Hidden Kingdoms
video.synopsis: The world is a big, dangerous place for these small creatures. Zoom in to see the daily lives of these tiny animals within their hidden environments.

episodes.synopsis: In Africa, a baby elephant shrew learns that keeping up is the key to survival; in America, a grasshopper mouse must outwit a range of predators.
episodes.title: Under Open Skies

episodes.synopsis: A North American chipmunk and a rainforest-dwelling tree shrew fight for food -- and their very survival -- in two very different climates.
episodes.title: Secret Forests

episodes.synopsis: Two urban dwellers -- a marmoset and a rhinoceros beetle -- make their homes on the city streets of Rio de Janeiro and Tokyo, respectively.
episodes.title: Urban Jungles
